subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The team, which fell to Arsenal, 1-0, in the Champions League on Wednesday, is suffering in Ligue 1 and no longer can count on a deafening home-field advantage.
snippet: The team, which fell to Arsenal, 1-0, in the Champions League on Wednesday, is suffering in Ligue 1 and no longer can count on a deafening home-field advantage.
